moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 c5: Enter in a Benoni defense if white advance the d pawn. Or English opening if g3

moves.15... Qb6: d5 it´s the Threat. But 16  b4 Nc6 and the white is better
